definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The Actavis Group hf. respects the privacy of the visitors to this website.
sentences.chinese: 阿特維斯集團尊重本網站訪問者的隱私。

sentences.english: Or you can have a form to collect visitors' comments about your site.
sentences.chinese: 或者可以創建表格收集訪問者對網站的評論。

sentences.english: A pageview indicates that a visitor has viewed a certain page on the website.
sentences.chinese: 頁面視圖意味着訪問者已經瀏覽了網站上的一些頁面。

sentences.english: It gave visitors a strong impression they’d have to register in order to check out.
sentences.chinese: 它給訪問者造成的強烈印象是他們必須註冊才能結賬。

sentences.english: That’s far easier than getting more visitors.
sentences.chinese: 這比獲得更多訪問者要容易得多。

sentences.english: You can use different approaches to introduce your new web-service to your visitors.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過不同的途徑向你的訪問者介紹網站服務。

sentences.english: A statistics application can give you the browsing route of a visitor.
sentences.chinese: 統計應用可以給你提供訪問者的瀏覽路線。

sentences.english: Prevent visitors from viewing and printing your source code.
sentences.chinese: 阻止訪問者查看並打印您的源代碼。

sentences.english: This encourages visitor traffic and promotes client reorders .
sentences.chinese: 這些鼓勵了交易訪問者並促進了客戶再次定貨。

sentences.english: The vicious visitors visited the virtual village. The vicious visitors visited the virtual village.
sentences.chinese: 惡毒的訪問者拜訪了虛擬的村莊。

sentences.english: Visitors who read beyond the headline, scan subheadings .
sentences.chinese: 不瀏覽標題的訪問者，會注意副標題。

sentences.english: You can also view a listof pages each visitor has viewed.
sentences.chinese: 你還可以瀏覽一個訪問者瀏覽過的網頁的列表。

sentences.english: Visitors were amazed at the students' conversational fluency in English.
sentences.chinese: 訪問者對學生們流利的英語感到驚訝。

sentences.english: A categorical arrangement of specimens is needed to show the visitors.
sentences.chinese: 標本的分類排列需要展示給訪問者看。

sentences.english: Famous visitors include Ngawang Namgyal in the 17th century and Milarepa.
sentences.chinese: 著名的訪問者包括阿旺朗傑在17世紀和米拉日巴。

sentences.english: Visitors have to provide some input to start browsing through the site.
sentences.chinese: 訪問者必須提供一些輸入，才能啓動瀏覽網站。
